titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: Charles E. Nash (1886-1967) was a Presbyterian minister. He graduated from Pittsburgh-Xenia Seminary in 1909 and was pastor of churches in Wisconsin, New York, Pennsylvania, and Ohio.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of the papers of Charles E. Nash. Materials include: 15 books of Nash's sermons, 1937-1960; several indexes to sermons, one of which also includes notes on funeral services performed by Nash; and a book of daily devotions broadcast on the WILE radio station in Cambridge, Ohio, in 1958.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
